name: built-for-base-token-inspector
description: Built-for-Base Token Inspector â€“ TypeScript/Vite project leveraging Coinbase SDKs for wallet and onchain inspection.

@coinbase/wallet-sdk.why: Primary SDK for connecting and interacting with Coinbase Wallet.
